subject: Wrong item received
body: Hello, my name is Sarah Leblanc. I ordered a red jacket but got a blue sweater. Can you help?

subject: Refund not processed
body: I returned the shoes on April 2 but haven’t seen the refund on my VISA ending in 4558.

subject: Password reset not working
body: Hi, this is Paul. I tried resetting my password but the link just leads to an error page.

subject: Tracking number invalid
body: The number you sent (1Z2045E1234567890) shows no updates since last week. Where’s my order?

subject: Order placed by mistake
body: I accidentally confirmed an order to 2124 Maple Street, Seattle. Can I cancel it?

subject: Billing issue – double charged
body: Hi, I was charged twice on April 11. The transaction IDs are 9834-221 and 9834-222. Please fix.

subject: Unable to log in – urgent
body: Hi, this is Diego Rivera. My account (diego.rivera@gmail.com) says suspended. I need access now.

subject: App crashes on checkout
body: Every time I reach the payment screen on the mobile app, it crashes instantly. I'm using iOS 17.

subject: Need invoice for business purchase
body: Can you send the invoice for order #456789 to jean.duval@protech-solutions.com?

subject: Privacy concern
body: My account shows an address I’ve never used: 33 King Street, Toronto. Is my account compromised?

subject: Order confirmation not received
body: Hi, I placed an order yesterday under the name Alice Dubois (alice.dubois@gmail.com) but haven't received any confirmation yet.

subject: Billing address error
body: My invoice shows the wrong billing address. It should be 21 Queen Street, Toronto. Can you correct this for Kevin Zhang?

subject: Payment declined with Visa
body: The checkout page keeps rejecting my Visa card ending in 4432. My phone number is +1 416 555 9876 if you need to reach me.

subject: Product arrived damaged
body: Hi, I'm Maxime Leclerc and I received a broken ceramic vase in order #775342. Here's a photo: imgur.com/def456.jpg

subject: Can't reset my password
body: I tried resetting my password twice but never got the email. My username is sarah_92 and I registered with sarah@protonmail.com.

subject: Refund request – duplicate charge
body: I was charged twice for order 982373 made under Mark O'Connell. Please refund the second $49.99 transaction to my Mastercard.

subject: Order shipped to wrong address
body: The package went to my old address at 98 rue de Lille, Paris. I updated it last week to 12 avenue Mozart, but it didn't apply.

subject: Security alert: account hacked
body: Hello, I think someone accessed my account without permission. I got an email that someone changed the password from a Toronto IP.

subject: Tracking number invalid
body: The tracking number 1Z98765W is not recognized by UPS. I placed the order using the name Paulo Oliveira.

subject: Can't apply discount code
body: Tried using promo code SPRING25 but it says expired. I'm a regular customer (registered under emily_ross@outlook.com).

subject: Order never arrived – need help ASAP
body: Hi, I'm John Carpenter. I placed an order (#78321) on March 3rd, but it still hasn't been delivered. My address is 45 Wellington St, Toronto. Can you check?

subject: Refund for duplicate charge
body: Hello, I noticed I've been charged twice for the same item. My bank account ending in 9982 shows two debits. Please refund the extra. Email: sara.gomez99@mail.com

subject: Incorrect item received
body: This is Henry. I ordered a blue Bluetooth speaker but received a green one instead. Phone: (514) 789-2233. I'd like a replacement ASAP.

subject: Can't reset password
body: Whenever I try the reset link, it says 'token expired'. I'm Jane L., using the email jane_l@hotmail.com. Please assist.

subject: Damaged product on arrival
body: My order was delivered yesterday, but the coffee machine is cracked. I can send a picture if needed. The tracking number was UPS-3482981. Thanks.

subject: Account hacked – urgent
body: Hello support, someone accessed my account and changed the shipping address to 12B Pinecrest Ave, Vancouver. I didn’t authorize this. Please secure my account.

subject: Late delivery – tracking shows stuck
body: Order #99821 has been 'in transit' for 6 days. The tracking hasn't updated since April 12. Can you escalate this? – Priya Singh

subject: Cancel subscription
body: Hi, I want to cancel my auto-renewal subscription for the gourmet box. My account is under markus.steele@gmail.com.

subject: Error in checkout process
body: I’m trying to place an order, but your payment page crashes after entering card details. Please fix.

subject: Need invoice with company name
body: Can you issue an invoice addressed to 'Atlas Consulting Inc.' for order #67329? It’s for reimbursement.

subject: Order delivered to wrong address
body: Hello, I received confirmation that my package was delivered, but it’s not at 117 Grandview Ave, Ottawa — that’s my actual address. Can you investigate?

subject: Still waiting on refund
body: This is Olivier D., following up on the refund for order #77654. It was approved last week but not yet visible on my RBC account ending in 4432.

subject: Subscription cancelled without my consent
body: Hey, I didn’t cancel my premium subscription. My email is ryan.lopez@mailbox.org. Can you restore it?

subject: Gift card not received
body: Hi, I bought a $50 gift card for my sister at emily.parker@hotmail.com but she never got the email. Please resend or refund.

subject: Can't update shipping info
body: The site gives an error when I try to update my shipping address to 888 Rue Saint-Denis, Montréal. Please fix ASAP.

subject: Wrong currency charged
body: I selected CAD but was billed in USD. Name: Mélanie Roy, order #234879. Can this be corrected?

subject: Payment failed multiple times
body: I tried paying with my Visa ending in 7611 and Mastercard ending in 4890, both failed. I don’t understand why.

subject: Received used item instead of new
body: The shoes I ordered came dirty and obviously used. I ordered new. Very disappointed. Invoice was in the name 'Harper & Co. LTD'.

subject: Bug in promo code system
body: Code SPRING25 says 'invalid' even though it's on your homepage. Tested on Safari and Chrome.

subject: Account locked after failed logins
body: Too many failed attempts and now my account is locked. Username: cynthia89. Please unlock it. Email: c.dupont@gmail.com

subject: URGENT: Package marked as delivered but stolen
body: My parcel was marked as delivered at 6:15 PM but it’s not on my porch. I live at 39 Lakeview Dr, Mississauga. I need this for surgery recovery. Please escalate.

subject: Card charged but order not showing in account
body: Hi, my VISA ending in 1234 was charged $87.50, but there’s no order listed. My account is registered under laure.martinez@outlook.com.

subject: Security alert – login from unknown device
body: I received a notification of a login from Spain. I’m in Montreal. Please block any access and reset my account. Name: Youssef K.

subject: Cannot access order history – dashboard broken
body: My orders page is blank since yesterday. Tried Firefox and Edge. Account linked to justin.taylor92@gmail.com. Please help.

subject: Medical device delayed – critical timing
body: I ordered a glucose meter for my father and it’s still in transit after 9 days. Tracking: FedEx-00344381. This is medically urgent.

subject: Wrong item auto-shipped – I never ordered this
body: An espresso machine I never ordered was charged and sent to 5005 Côte-des-Neiges, Montreal. I suspect fraud.

subject: Account deactivated – urgent reactivation needed
body: My VIP business account was suddenly disabled. We rely on this for team purchasing. User: carol.b@optinet.ca

subject: Gift order sent to wrong person
body: The anniversary gift meant for my partner went to my ex by mistake – please recall this ASAP. Name on account: Lisa Paquette

subject: Delivery driver threatened me
body: I had a disturbing interaction with the courier delivering my order. Please escalate this incident and remove the driver from my route.

subject: Credit card fraud following recent order
body: Two days after placing an order, my card ending in 3489 was used for unauthorized transactions. This may be a leak on your side.

subject: Tracking page shows ‘delivered’ but nothing received
body: Order #90213 shows delivered yesterday at 3:20 PM. I was home all day. Name: Sophie Tremblay, 119 Queen Street E, Toronto. Please investigate.

subject: Can’t access invoice history
body: Hi, I need invoices from February to April for accounting. My account is registered with bruno.moreno@finix.ca. Please send them as PDF.

subject: Refund issued to wrong card
body: The $34 refund for the yoga mat went to my old Mastercard ending in 8741. It should’ve gone to 0993. Can you fix that?

subject: Paid twice via Apple Pay
body: Payment page glitched and Apple Pay was charged twice. Total should be $61.88. My Apple ID is linked to emily.zhao@icloud.com.

subject: Wrong item in mystery box
body: Hello, I received a men’s fragrance but I ordered the women’s. My shipping address is 2136 Fraser St, Vancouver. Order #88432.

subject: Order marked as returned – I never returned it
body: My package was marked returned to sender on April 24. That’s an error. I was expecting it. Name on order: Arnaud Petit

subject: Dispute a late delivery charge
body: Hi, I was charged $5 late delivery fee but the delay was on your side. My phone is 514-554-0099 in case you need to call.

subject: Coupon code rejected at checkout
body: The SPRING10 promo says valid until April 30, but I get ‘invalid code’. I’m using Chrome on Windows.

subject: Need invoice under different name
body: Can you resend the invoice for order #100231 under ‘Nova Tech Group Inc.’ instead of my name?

subject: Account auto-logged out during purchase
body: I was kicked out of my session during checkout and had to re-enter everything. Very frustrating. Username: daniel.montrealer

subject: Colis non reçu alors que livré
body: Bonjour, j'ai reçu une notification de livraison hier à 17h, mais rien dans ma boîte aux lettres. Nom : Claire Leclerc, adresse : 15 rue des Lilas, Paris 75019.

subject: No puedo cambiar la dirección de envío
body: Hola, intento actualizar mi dirección a Av. Las Palmas 123, Lima, pero la web da error. ¿Pueden ayudarme? Mi correo: lucia.ramirez@gmail.com

subject: Fattura richiesta con partita IVA
body: Salve, potete mandarmi la fattura per l’ordine 98231 intestata a Studio Legale Romano S.R.L.? Grazie.

subject: Ich habe ein beschädigtes Produkt erhalten
body: Die Kaffeemaschine ist kaputt angekommen. Ich habe Fotos. Meine Adresse: Sonnenallee 72, Berlin.

subject: Erreur de facturation
body: J’ai été facturé deux fois pour le même article. Carte terminant par 3382. Veuillez corriger.

subject: Problema com o pagamento via boleto
body: Oi, paguei via boleto na sexta, mas o pedido ainda aparece como 'não pago'. Email: joao.silva@uol.com.br

subject: Missed my delivery – can I reschedule?
body: I was not home when they tried to deliver my parcel. Can I get it tomorrow? Name: Daniel N., phone: 514-789-4455

subject: Mi paquete llegó incompleto
body: Faltan dos productos en mi pedido #28773. Solo llegó la camisa. ¿Y el pantalón? Dirección: Calle Robles 211, Bogotá.

subject: Problema con l'accesso all’account
body: Non riesco ad accedere al mio account. Username: marco_torino. Ho provato a reimpostare la password.

subject: Fichier manquant dans la livraison
body: Bonjour, j’ai commandé une clé USB avec des fichiers préchargés, mais elle est vide. Commande #80192. Je suis enseignant, c’est urgent.

subject: Retour produit non pris en compte
body: Bonjour, j’ai retourné le colis via Colissimo le 19 avril. Mon numéro de suivi est 8K19822844. Toujours aucun remboursement. Nom : Adrien Meunier.

subject: Problema al ingresar a mi cuenta
body: Intento iniciar sesión pero dice que mi contraseña es incorrecta. Ya la cambié. Usuario: claudia_lpz.

subject: Falsche Artikelgröße erhalten
body: Ich habe Größe M bestellt, aber Größe XL erhalten. Bitte senden Sie mir die richtige Größe für Artikel 88721.

subject: Paiement refusé sans raison
body: Impossible de finaliser l’achat, même après avoir changé de carte (Visa terminant par 9901). Adresse mail : noemie.aubry@free.fr

subject: Pagamento confirmado, mas pedido não aparece
body: Olá, paguei com PIX e já foi debitado, mas minha conta ainda mostra o pedido como pendente. Email: fernando.carvalho@yahoo.com.br

subject: Problem with gift card balance
body: Hi, I entered a $100 gift card but only $40 was applied to my order. The card number ends with 2912. Can you check?

subject: El repartidor dejó el paquete en la calle
body: Mi paquete fue dejado fuera del edificio sin avisarme. Vivo en Calle Aragón 88, Madrid. No estaba en casa.

subject: Comando duplicado
body: Efetuei uma compra, mas o site fez dois pedidos iguais. Só queria um. Nome: Camila Tavares, conta: cami.tav@gmail.com

subject: Fattura richiesta in formato elettronico
body: Potete inviare la fattura dell’ordine #88913 in formato XML per il sistema SDI italiano? Grazie mille.

subject: Cannot complete payment – error 503
body: Tried three times to complete my order. Every time the site crashes with error 503 after entering card info. Device: Android 13, browser: Chrome.

subject: Commande bloquée en douane
body: Ma commande #99321 est bloquée à la douane depuis 4 jours. Le numéro de suivi DHL est 752837118. C’est un cadeau, merci de débloquer la situation.

subject: Problema com entrega – endereço incompleto
body: O pedido foi enviado apenas com meu nome, sem rua. Endereço completo: Rua das Flores 1020, Porto Alegre. Nome: Bianca S.

subject: Login schlägt fehl trotz korrektem Passwort
body: Ich kann mich nicht einloggen. Passwort wurde gestern zurückgesetzt. Benutzername: tom.keller

subject: Problema al aplicar el descuento de estudiante
body: Mi código de estudiante ‘UNIV20’ no se aplica en el carrito. Captura de pantalla disponible si necesitan.

subject: Données personnelles exposées dans le colis
body: Votre étiquette de retour affiche mon numéro de téléphone complet : 06 89 12 34 55. C’est une faille de confidentialité.

subject: Can't apply store credit at checkout
body: My account has $20 in credit but I can’t use it on my current cart. Email: liam.wells@protonmail.com

subject: Pacco perso dal corriere
body: Il pacco risultava in consegna il 25 aprile ma non è mai arrivato. Tracking SDA 99387123. Indirizzo: Via Roma 11, Milano.

subject: Impossible de joindre le service client
body: Le chat en ligne reste bloqué sur 'chargement'. Aucun conseiller ne répond. C’est très frustrant.

subject: Error 403 ao acessar histórico de pedidos
body: Recebo erro 403 ao tentar ver pedidos anteriores no site. Navegador: Firefox. Email: andre.dias@gmail.com

subject: App crash during payment
body: Tried paying via app. After entering card (ends in 7121), the app crashed. Using iOS 17 on iPhone 14 Pro.

subject: Article non conforme à la description
body: J’ai commandé un tapis bleu (réf. 1881-B) mais j’ai reçu un tapis vert. Adresse : 11 avenue des Pins, Lyon. Nom : F. Morel.

subject: Problema al pagar con tarjeta internacional
body: Intenté pagar con mi tarjeta de débito del Banco Santander pero fue rechazada sin razón. Email: m.campos@gmail.com

subject: Kein Rücksendeetikett erhalten
body: Ich möchte einen Artikel zurücksenden, aber habe kein Rücksendeetikett per E-Mail erhalten. Bestellung #33489.

subject: Meu pedido está com status 'cancelado'
body: Meu pedido #54891 foi cancelado automaticamente, mas eu paguei via cartão Nubank (final 8412). Favor verificar.

subject: Fattura richiesta con codice fiscale
body: Buongiorno, vorrei ricevere la fattura per l'ordine #88329 intestata a Giuseppe R., CF: RSPGPP89H21H501Z

subject: App freezes during checkout
body: Every time I reach the payment step, the app becomes unresponsive. Device: Pixel 7, Android 14.

subject: Erreur dans l’adresse de livraison
body: Ma commande a été envoyée au 15 rue Montcalm à Bordeaux au lieu de 115 rue Montcalm. Merci de corriger.

subject: Pagamento feito, mas pedido sumiu
body: Paguei com cartão (final 3322) ontem, e hoje não vejo mais o pedido na minha conta. Nome: Rafael Tavares.

subject: Je ne peux pas appliquer mon bon d’achat
body: Bonjour, j’ai un bon de 25 € (réf. BON25-APRIL), mais il est refusé à l’étape de paiement.

subject: Security issue: password reset link reused
body: I noticed the reset link in my inbox can be opened multiple times without expiring. This is a security concern.

subject: Livraison partielle reçue
body: Bonjour, j’ai reçu seulement 2 articles sur les 4 commandés. Il manque le set de tasses et le plateau. Nom : Céline R., commande #109332.

subject: Mi cuenta fue bloqueada sin razón
body: No puedo acceder a mi cuenta. Sale el mensaje: 'usuario bloqueado por actividad sospechosa'. Correo: p.flores@gmail.com

subject: Tracking number incorrect
body: Hi, the tracking number you sent (TNT-99277312) doesn’t match any shipment. Can you check if it's correct?

subject: Artikel nicht wie beschrieben
body: Der erhaltene Artikel ist viel kleiner als in der Beschreibung angegeben. Ich möchte eine Rückerstattung. Kunde: Martin H.

subject: Pagamento duplicado via cartão
body: Fui cobrado duas vezes por uma única compra no cartão final 2210. Nome: Ana Beatriz Ferreira, pedido #88342.

subject: Richiesta di assistenza urgente – ordine perso
body: Non riesco a tracciare il mio ordine #561203 da oltre 5 giorni. Email registrata: giulia.rossi@libero.it

subject: Coupon code expired too early
body: The code SPRING30 says 'expired' even though your promo says valid until May 5. Can you reactivate it?

subject: Erreur dans le nom sur la facture
body: La facture est au nom de 'Client Divers'. Merci de corriger avec mon vrai nom : Jean-Philippe Legrand.

subject: Mi pedido llegó con productos rotos
body: Los vasos del set llegaron rotos. Tengo fotos. Dirección: Calle Lavalle 1123, Buenos Aires.

subject: Problema com a nota fiscal eletrônica
body: Olá, a NF-e da minha compra #77211 não foi enviada. Preciso dela para o reembolso da empresa (CNPJ: 45.278.991/0001-90).

subject: Commande expédiée en double
body: Bonjour, j’ai reçu deux colis identiques pour une seule commande. Dois-je renvoyer le second ? Nom : Nicolas Perret.

subject: Problema con la devolución
body: Hola, hice la devolución hace 12 días pero aún no aparece el reembolso en mi tarjeta Visa terminada en 1023.

subject: Wrong item color received
body: I ordered the black model but received a silver one. This was meant as a gift. My address is 12 Westmount Ave, Toronto.

subject: Problema com cadastro do CPF
body: O site não aceita meu CPF para finalizar a compra. CPF: 248.991.007-34. Poderiam verificar?

subject: Artikel zurückgeschickt, aber keine Rückerstattung
body: Ich habe am 20. April den Artikel zurückgesendet. Bisher kein Geld erhalten. E-Mail: hans.mueller@gmx.de

subject: Fattura non conforme
body: La fattura emessa non include l’IVA separata. Partita IVA: 03145820987. Cliente: Eleonora Bianchi.

subject: Gift option not applied
body: I selected 'gift wrapping' but the package arrived with price tags and no message. Recipient: Claire Dumont.

subject: Erreur 500 à l’ajout au panier
body: Quand je clique sur 'Ajouter au panier', j’ai une erreur 500. Navigateur : Safari sur iPhone 13.

subject: Problemas para receber SMS de verificação
body: Não recebo o código SMS no meu número 11 99812-2209 para ativar a conta.

subject: Impossible de modifier l'adresse après paiement
body: J’ai payé avec la mauvaise adresse enregistrée. Le colis va partir au mauvais endroit. Nom de compte : lucas_digital

subject: Livraison à une ancienne adresse
body: Mon colis a été expédié à mon ancienne adresse au 82 boulevard Haussmann, Paris. Mon compte a pourtant été mis à jour.

subject: No puedo aplicar el cupón de primer pedido
body: Hola, intento usar el código 'BIENVENIDO10' pero la web dice que ya fue usado, aunque es mi primer pedido.

subject: Payment succeeded but confirmation missing
body: My credit card (ending in 6134) was charged, but I didn’t receive any confirmation. Email: julie.mackenzie@protonmail.com

subject: Produto veio com defeito na tela
body: Recebi o tablet hoje e a tela está com uma rachadura visível. Posso trocar? Pedido #92138.

subject: Zugriff auf frühere Bestellungen nicht möglich
body: Die Bestellübersicht zeigt nur Daten bis März an. Ich brauche eine Rechnung vom 7. April.

subject: Non posso scaricare la ricevuta fiscale
body: Buongiorno, il link per scaricare la ricevuta porta a una pagina vuota. Ordine #100781.

subject: Colis laissé sous la pluie
body: Bonjour, le livreur a laissé le colis devant chez moi alors qu’il pleuvait. Tout est mouillé. Nom : Monique A.

subject: My login gets reset every day
body: Every time I return to the site, I have to log in again. I checked 'Remember me'. Browser: Firefox 124.0

subject: Código de rastreamento inválido
body: O código Correios CP2038391BR não aparece como válido no site oficial. Podem verificar?

subject: Assistance urgente – colis volé
body: Le colis a été déclaré livré, mais je ne l’ai jamais reçu. Adresse : 17 rue du Maréchal Foch, Lille. Merci d’ouvrir une enquête.

subject: Erreur de facturation sur mon compte
body: J’ai été facturé deux fois pour la commande #112789. Merci de vérifier avec mon compte enregistré : helene.dubois@yahoo.fr

subject: Pedido chegou incompleto
body: Faltam 2 produtos na caixa. Recebi só a camiseta, mas não veio a calça e o boné. Nome: Marcos F. Pereira.

subject: Die Lieferung ist stark verspätet
body: Ich habe am 24. April bestellt, aber noch keine Versandbestätigung erhalten. Kundenname: Lukas Huber.

subject: Can’t use PayPal at checkout
body: When I select PayPal, the button disappears after 2 seconds. I’m using Safari on MacOS.

subject: Erreur d’article dans le colis reçu
body: J’ai commandé une cafetière rouge mais j’ai reçu un grille-pain. Référence : #90187. Adresse : 5 rue Danton, Lyon.

subject: Non ricevo l’SMS per convalidare l’acquisto
body: Salve, non ricevo il codice sul mio numero 348 774 3302. Non posso finalizzare il pagamento.

subject: Mi cuenta fue suspendida sin aviso
body: Intenté ingresar hoy y dice que mi cuenta fue deshabilitada. ¿Por qué? Correo: valeria.garcia@hotmail.com

subject: App closes when opening order details
body: Every time I click on a past order, the app force quits. Android 13, Samsung Galaxy A53.

subject: Cobrança indevida no cartão
body: Vejo uma cobrança de R$ 259 no meu cartão que não reconheço. Final 0881. Podem verificar?

subject: Reçu de livraison manquant
body: Le livreur n’a pas laissé de reçu ni fait signer quoi que ce soit. C’est problématique pour mes remboursements internes.

subject: Commande annulée sans raison
body: Bonjour, ma commande #99211 a été annulée alors que le paiement est passé. Mon email : celine.robitaille@orange.fr

subject: Problemas com a atualização de endereço
body: Mudei meu endereço para Rua Marquês de Pombal 765, Recife, mas o pedido foi para o antigo. Pedido #88221.

subject: Order status stuck on 'processing'
body: It’s been 4 days and my order #77432 still says 'processing'. Card was charged (ending in 9910).

subject: Rücksendung wurde nicht anerkannt
body: Ich habe den Artikel letzte Woche zurückgeschickt. Trotzdem wird mir nichts gutgeschrieben. Name: Johanna W.

subject: No llega el reembolso a mi cuenta
body: Hola, me prometieron el reembolso el lunes pero aún no aparece en mi cuenta BBVA. ¿Cuánto tarda normalmente?

subject: Fattura errata – manca intestazione aziendale
body: La ricevuta per l’ordine #100912 è intestata a persona fisica. Serve 'Alfa Digital S.r.l.'.

subject: Impossible d’ajouter une nouvelle carte
body: Quand je tente d’ajouter ma nouvelle carte Visa (**** 4450), j’ai une erreur 'carte invalide'. Testé sur Chrome et Safari.

subject: App shows wrong delivery date
body: My order #76392 shows expected delivery May 3, but tracking says May 7. Please clarify.

subject: Cupón 'HOLA15' no funciona
body: Intenté usar el código en mi primera compra y me dice 'código inválido'. Navegador: Edge

subject: Envio duplicado
body: Recebi dois pacotes iguais hoje. Não quero ser cobrado duas vezes. Nome: Gabriela Nascimento.

subject: Erreur d’adresse de facturation
body: Ma facture affiche encore mon ancienne adresse : 128 rue Nationale, Tours. Merci de corriger pour mes déclarations.

subject: No puedo descargar la etiqueta de devolución
body: Al hacer clic en el enlace para la devolución, aparece un error 404. Pedido: #987321

subject: Wrong price charged
body: The website said $49.99 but I was charged $59.99 on my card ending in 3392. Please refund the difference.

subject: Errore nel nome sulla fattura
body: Il mio nome è scritto male nella fattura: risulta 'Giusepina' invece di 'Giuseppina'. Ordine #775432

subject: Produto não está mais funcionando
body: Comprei um fone bluetooth e parou de funcionar após uma semana. Nome: Bruno M. Silva

subject: Rückerstattung geht auf falsche Karte
body: Die Rückzahlung wurde auf eine alte Karte gebucht (**** 4812). Ich benutze jetzt **** 7220.

subject: Cannot apply loyalty points
body: I have 2,300 loyalty points but the system won’t let me use them at checkout. Account: emily.carter@gmail.com

subject: Impossible de contacter le livreur
body: Le lien de suivi renvoie vers une page vide. Impossible de joindre Chronopost. Mon colis est urgent.

subject: Cupom aplicado mas valor errado
body: Usei o código PROMO10 mas o desconto foi de apenas 5%. Pedido #732218

subject: Verzögerung beim Versand
body: Meine Bestellung steht seit 3 Tagen auf 'wird vorbereitet'. Ich brauche sie dringend bis Freitag.

subject: Colis déclaré livré mais rien reçu
body: Bonjour, La Poste indique que le colis a été livré hier à 16h20. Je n’ai rien reçu. Adresse : 19 avenue Jean Jaurès, Toulouse.

subject: No recibí la confirmación del pedido
body: Hice el pedido hace una hora y aún no llega el correo de confirmación. Mi correo es ana.perez@mail.com

subject: Missing invoice for expense report
body: I need the invoice for order #555093 to submit my work expense. Account email: mark.robbins@outlook.com

subject: Erro na cobrança
body: Cobrado em duplicidade no cartão final 1038. Pedido único, valor foi debitado duas vezes.

subject: Rechnung auf falschen Namen
body: Die Rechnung wurde auf 'Max Mustermann' ausgestellt. Bitte korrigieren auf meinen Namen: Franziska Berger.

subject: Non trovo l’opzione per il reso
body: Vorrei restituire l’articolo ma non trovo il pulsante 'Avvia reso' nella sezione ordini. Ordine #904331.

subject: Live chat unresponsive
body: I’ve been waiting for 20 minutes in the chat queue. Still no response from any agent. It’s urgent.

subject: Código promocional expirado antes do prazo
body: O código 'MAIO15' já aparece como inválido, mas a promoção vai até dia 10/05.

subject: Fattura elettronica non ricevuta
body: Ordine #812190 consegnato ma non ho ricevuto la fattura elettronica via PEC.

subject: Suivi erroné
body: Le suivi indique 'livré' à une autre ville que la mienne. Nom : Théo Marchand. Merci d’enquêter.

subject: Erreur dans le numéro de téléphone de livraison
body: Bonjour, le livreur n’a pas pu me joindre car mon numéro est erroné sur le bon : 06 82 44 10 19 est le bon.

subject: Pedido duplicado
body: Hice un solo pedido, pero recibí dos cobros y dos emails de confirmación. Nombre: Diego Rivas.

subject: Can't change delivery date
body: I need to reschedule delivery for order #781231 but the 'change date' button is greyed out.

subject: Problema com boleto vencido
body: Tentei pagar com boleto mas passou o vencimento. Ainda posso pagar ou refaço o pedido?

subject: Falsche Lieferadresse verwendet
body: Obwohl ich sie geändert habe, wurde das Paket an meine alte Adresse geschickt: Goethestraße 11, Leipzig.

subject: Impossibile tracciare la spedizione
body: Il numero di tracking SDA-8745632 risulta inesistente. Potete confermare se è corretto?

subject: Delivery agent was rude
body: Your delivery driver was extremely rude and refused to bring the package to my door. Please escalate this complaint.

subject: Facture avec mauvais taux de TVA
body: La TVA appliquée est de 10 %, alors que je suis assujetti à 5.5 %. Merci de corriger pour l’ordre #799201.

subject: Cupom inserido mas não deu desconto
body: Inseri o código FRETEGRÁTIS e ainda assim foi cobrado o frete de R$ 12,90.

subject: Problema con l'accesso via Facebook
body: Clicco su 'Accedi con Facebook' ma la pagina resta bianca. Dispositivo: iPhone 14, iOS 17.

subject: Erreur dans la taille reçue
body: J’ai commandé du 42 mais j’ai reçu une paire en taille 39. Référence commande #891234. Nom : Luc Moreau.

subject: No puedo acceder a mi historial de pedidos
body: Intento ver mis pedidos anteriores pero la sección aparece vacía. Mi usuario es maria.fuentes92.

subject: Payment failed but card charged
body: I got a payment error, but my bank shows a $98.00 debit (card ending in 3011). No confirmation received.

subject: Produto chegou sem nota fiscal
body: Recebi a encomenda hoje mas não veio NF-e. CNPJ da empresa: 45.928.001/0001-45

subject: Rechnung fehlt im Paket
body: Ich brauche die Rechnung für meine Buchhaltung. Sie war nicht im Paket enthalten. Bestellnummer: 773210.

subject: Errore nel colore dell’articolo ricevuto
body: Ho ordinato il modello blu, ma è arrivato in nero. Posso fare un cambio? Ordine #991002.

subject: App keeps logging me out
body: Every time I open the app, I’m asked to log in again. 'Remember me' doesn’t work.

subject: Livraison partielle, article manquant
body: Le colis est arrivé mais il manque le chargeur USB. Adresse : 42 rue des Acacias, Reims. Nom : Claire R.

subject: Cupón válido pero no se aplica
body: El cupón VERANO20 figura como activo pero el descuento no aparece en el carrito.

subject: Pagamento duplicado via PIX
body: Paguei duas vezes o pedido #900321 via PIX porque a primeira tentativa ficou como 'pendente'. Preciso do estorno.

subject: Facture non reçue par email
body: Bonjour, je n’ai toujours pas reçu la facture de ma commande #872001. Mon adresse : sabrina.b@laposte.net

subject: Mi pedido fue entregado a la dirección equivocada
body: El paquete aparece como entregado en Rosario, pero vivo en Córdoba. ¿Pueden verificar el número de seguimiento?

subject: Can’t find how to download invoice
body: There’s no download button for invoice on my order #884129. Using Chrome on Windows 11.

subject: Pedido chegou com item quebrado
body: A garrafa térmica veio trincada. Posso enviar fotos? Pedido: 773981. Nome: Lucas Andrade.

subject: Fehlermeldung beim Bezahlen mit Klarna
body: Ich bekomme einen 'Zahlung fehlgeschlagen'-Fehler bei Klarna, obwohl alles korrekt ist.

subject: Errore nella quantità ricevuta
body: Ho ordinato 3 confezioni ma ne è arrivata solo una. Ordine #801299. Email: roberta.costa@virgilio.it

subject: App crashes when uploading return photo
body: Trying to start a return with photo proof, but the app crashes after selecting image. Android 12.

subject: Article reçu sans câble d’alimentation
body: L’imprimante est arrivée sans câble secteur. Impossible de l’utiliser. Numéro de commande : 762399.

subject: Cupón no válido
body: El cupón PRIMAVERA25 aparece como 'no válido' aunque está en la homepage como activo hasta el 10/05.

subject: Problema na atualização de senha
body: Recebi o link para redefinir minha senha, mas ao clicar, aparece 'link inválido ou expirado'.
